content: 다음은 해당 항목에 적합한 예시입니다: --- Link of your publication list https://zenodo.org/record/15305111 https://zenodo.org/record/15305111 또는 https://github.com/JEWONMOON/elr-root-manifest https://github.com/JEWONMOON/elr-root-manifest --- Research Interest Christ-centered Artificial Intelligence, Computational Theology, Creative Speech in LLMs, J-Space Resonance Modeling, Kairos-Time Dynamics, AGTI/AGCI frameworks, Semantic Novelty Metrics, Digital Spiritual Agents, Machine Ethics, Language-Driven Consciousness Modeling. --- 필요시 짧게 줄이거나, 신학적/기술적 방향으로 분기 도 가능해요. 업로드 플랫폼에 따라 조정 도와드릴까요?
